summary:
I have led different vision and sensing projects in automotive, electrical and electronics manufacturing businesses. Throughout my career with knowledge of PMBOK standard, I’ve become an expert on developing full-scale project plans, ensuring alignment of scope, timeline and budget with customers and partners, reporting, and escalating to the management as needed.

I use my applied physics expertise to drive technical analysis, identify risks, and develop corrective actions to keep projects on track.

In addition to this I have extensive experience of optical component sourcing. I managed component implementation process from conception, pre-production through to completion and providing technical support to the project teams and wider regional teams.


I use my applied physics expertise to drive technical analysis identify risks, and develop corrective actions to keep projects on track.

• Develop comprehensive project plans to be shared with clients as well as other stakeholders
• Responsible from evaluation and approval of new optical components
• Provide technical support to the project teams and wider regional teams about optical components and give feedback about mechanical and electrical design of the displays via optical parameters, report and escalate to the management as needed
• Optical inspection during trial periods, define possible problems with optical design and delegate the issues to the related team members
• Manage projects optical components budgets and keeping cost down
• Responsible to create and maintain comprehensive project documentation
• Responsible from collect all optical components evaluation reports from the project engineers
• Liaise with vendors on a regular basis to ensure the successful design and manufacture of products to agreed budgets and time frames', 'title': 'Technical Program Manager  - R&D Optical Systems Design Group Vestel', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}, {'location': 'Manisa, Turkey', 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, 'company': 'Vestel', 'description': "▪ Design and development of optical systems for display products with the various phases of a program schedule, i.e. feasibility, design, design verification, certification, production launch
▪ Work with mechanical, power and electronic system design teams to identify the scope, constraints, and risks for design, fabrication, testing and mass production of backlight units for display products.
▪ Work with cross-functional team to develop the next-generation optical system that including displays and optics.
▪ Collaborate with the mechanical, power and electronic system design teams to meet the required product display specs.
▪Responsible from optimization of the system for high-volume consumer applications
▪ Create specs to evaluate displays' performance", 'title': 'Optical Design Engineer', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 8970, 'name': 'TUBITAK', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D4D0BAQGUUJE2IgZ01g/company-logo_400_400/0/1685788261713?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=u3We9xK8z0wlCW6fQwlEAdu1T0JV9U3J7-Kh8trbv0E', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/tubitak/', 'employees': {'start': 1001, 'end': 5000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Ankara, Türkiye', 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}}, 'company': 'TÜBİTAK', 'description': None, 'title': 'INTERN-OPTİCAL DESIGN ENGINEER-TUBITAK -
